alert_rules.description: Non-urgent issues requiring resolution within 72 hours (P3 SLA). Email notifications and daily/weekly digests. No immediate action required, but track for trends and compliance.

rules.name: P2/P3 Incident Daily Digest
rules.description: Daily summary of P2 and P3 incidents for security team review. Sent at 9 AM UTC with previous 24 hours activity.

query.query_string: event_type:INCIDENT_CREATED AND incident.severity:("P2-Medium" OR "P3-Low") AND @timestamp:[now-24h TO now]

actions.subject: Daily Incident Digest - {{date}}

rules.name: Non-Security Configuration Changes
rules.description: Daily summary of non-security configuration changes for change management audit trail. Tracks deployments, feature flags, application config.

query.query_string: event_type:CONFIG_CHANGE AND NOT resource_type:(iam_role OR security_group OR firewall OR mfa_policy) AND @timestamp:[now-24h TO now]

actions.subject: Configuration Changes - {{date}}

rules.retention: Retain emails for 7 years per SOC 2 CC7.2 audit trail requirement

rules.name: Security Training Overdue
rules.description: Weekly reminder for users with security training >365 days old. SOC 2 CC1.4 requires annual training. Escalates to manager if >30 days overdue.

actions.subject: Action Required: Annual Security Training Overdue
actions.body_template:
Hi {{user_name}},

Our records show your last security training was completed on **{{training_last_completed}}**, which is **{{days_overdue}} days ago**.

**SOC 2 Compliance Requirement:** All employees must complete annual security training per policy SEC-002.

**Action Required:**
1. Complete the security awareness training at: {{training_portal_link}}
2. Estimated time: 45 minutes
3. Deadline: {{deadline}}

**Training Modules:**
- Password security and MFA
- Phishing recognition
- Data classification and handling
- Incident reporting
- AI agent security (OpenClaw-specific)

**Consequences of Non-Completion:**
- After {{deadline}}: Access to non-critical systems may be restricted
- After 30 additional days: Manager escalation and access suspension

Questions? Contact security-team@openclaw.ai

Thank you,
OpenClaw Security Team

escalation.if_overdue_90_days: Suspend all access pending training completion

rules.name: Vulnerability Scan Weekly Summary
rules.description: Weekly vulnerability scan results with HIGH and CRITICAL findings. Sent Friday 5 PM UTC for review and planning upcoming sprint patching priorities.

actions.subject: Weekly Vulnerability Summary - Week {{week_number}}

rules.name: Backup Verification Warnings
rules.description: Weekly backup health report. Includes: success rate, failed backups, verification failures, restore test results, RTO/RPO compliance.

actions.subject: Backup Health Report - Week {{week_number}}

escalation.if_no_backup_24h: Page CISO - critical data loss risk

sla.escalation: If unresolved after 5 days, escalate to security team lead for prioritization
